name: To Catch A Liar
description:
This is a puzzle shooting game. You must shoot the liar to proceed to the next level. You are given two clues to figure out which one is the liar. First, the character in the bottom left has two traits (hat, body color, or item) that are the same as the liar, and one that is different. It's 2 truths and a lie. Next, the liar will be highlighted in red once you find him. However, innocent people that have one trait or nothing in common with the liar may also be highlighted in red, so watch out!

Can you find all the liars? 

Controls: Mouse to shoot and click through dialogue. Press M to mute the music.
